alert.note: Alert for Cave Creek, New River; Central Phoenix; Deer Valley; East Valley; Fountain Hills, East Mesa; North Phoenix, Glendale; Rio Verde, Salt River; Scottsdale, Paradise Valley (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 01 at 7:31PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Maricopa County through 815 PM MST... At 730 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Downtown Scottsdale, or near Paradise Valley, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Phoenix, Mesa, Scottsdale, Tempe, Fountain Hills, Paradise Valley, Mesa Riverview Mall, Tempe Marketplace, Papago Park, Granite Reef Dam, McDowell Mountain Park, Salt River Indian Community, Downtown Mesa, Downtown Scottsdale, Goldfield Ranch, Arizona State University, Fiesta Mall, Scottsdale Airport, Camelback Mountain and Rio Verde. This includes the following highways... AZ Interstate 10 near mile marker 147. AZ Route 51 between mile markers 1 and 2. US Highway 60 between mile markers 174 and 178. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Cave Creek, New River; Central Phoenix; Deer Valley; East Valley; Fountain Hills, East Mesa; North Phoenix, Glendale; Rio Verde, Salt River; Scottsdale, Paradise Valley
